name: BB-RSI Mean Reversion ETF Strategy
description: Daily mean-reversion strategy on large-cap equity ETFs using Bollinger Bands (20,2) and RSI(14). Long when price closes below the lower BB and RSI<30; short when price closes above upper BB and RSI>70. Exit on touch of 20-day SMA or RSI≈50. Fixed 1 % stop and 2 % target, with 5 % capital allocation per trade.
